derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek thallos 'green shoot', because of the green line in its spectrum

means.word_mean: 1. a soft gray malleable metallic element that resembles tin but discolors on exposure to air; it is highly toxic and is used in rodent and insect poisons; occurs in zinc blende and some iron ores
